channel.title: Raspberry Pi on gardenR
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on gardenR

item.title: Raspberry Pi fun
item.description: Today I tried to set up my Pi and the DHT22 sensor. It was all going to well in the beginning. The stuff I ordered from eBay arrived really fast (see references section for supplier details) and I was bright eyed and bushy tailed this morning at 10am. Problem number 1: I have no idea about electronics To elaborate, I tried to use a couple of really great tutorials I found online, to help set up the sensor and store the data in a mysql database.
